title: FS: T207 Wallace and 1913 Napoleon Lajoie Game Card. Sold, thanks
author: edjs

posts.post_title: FS: T207 Wallace and 1913 Napoleon Lajoie Game Card. Sold, thanks
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to sell my T207 Recruit fac. 606 Wallace ($25) and 1913 Napoleon Lajoie Game Card ($25). I accept  PayPal, check or MO   for   these.  Prices are net to me, so please add 3%  for regular   PayPal.  Domestic shipping is $3.50 per order and of course I will combine shipping.  Shipping to other countries, I will work  with you on price.  I'm sure this is the wrong place for the Lajoie, but no section says it is for game cards, so I figured I would combine it with the T207.

Scans available on  request.

PM, or e-mail with questions or offers ( [URL="skeltone@rocketmail.com"]skeltone@rocketmail.com[/URL]  ). A firm "I'll take it" will out do ongoing  negotiations.  Thanks for looking.

Make an offer, you never know!
